name: FALL
description: FALL is a 3d action game in fully physically calculations. You can break the Objects buildings and stratum in real time. You have to kill the enemy or break the wall while falling.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP,7,8,10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo Memory: 100 MB RAM Graphics: GEFORCE 980GT DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound
recommended_requirements: OS: XP,7,8,10 Processor: Intel Corei7 Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 600 Series Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound
